meanings.definition: Promoting the excretion of salt or sodium from the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a saluretic medication to help reduce the salt levels in his body.
meanings.sent2: She knew the importance of maintaining a saluretic diet to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The salad dressing was so saluretic that it made the lettuce taste like a salty sea breeze.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to fitness was like a saluretic force, constantly pushing out the excess salt from his system.
meanings.sent5: The image of a waterfall cascading down a mountain represented the body's natural saluretic process.

meanings.definition: A substance that promotes the excretion of salt or sodium from the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended a saluretic to help with his sodium levels.
meanings.sent2: She purchased a natural saluretic from the health store to aid in salt removal.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine at work seemed to dispense only sugary snacks, no saluretic options in sight.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against high blood pressure, the saluretic acted as a brave warrior, fighting off excess salt.
meanings.sent5: The kitchen pantry was stocked with various saluretics to support their healthy eating habits.
